title: Grimly

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Grimly divebombs a target head-first, breaking their guard and lowering their defense to Vulnerable for this night and the next one.
- Dash to a target of your choice, everyone visiting you will be silently redirected to your target. (2 uses)
- Grimly's Ultimate ability, Grimly distorts time, slowing down Non-mutants and the environment, this is announced at the end of the day as "The time flow has slowed down to a grinding halt, only mutants may perform actions tonight!". (2 uses, shared by non-killing mutants, Day action)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot block, and you may only use your ultimate ability once, these are disabled if you are the last mutant alive.
- Redirect Immune.

desc:
Post 3536
*A ghoulish, dark blue, amorphous mutant, Lacking arms or legs, its lower half tapers into a curly tail, and its large, clawed hands are completely detached from its body.*
